com.rivelbop.rivelworks.util

Class ThreadGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.util.ThreadGroup

  • public class ThreadGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to handle multiple threads.
    Author:
    David Jerzak (RivelBop)

      • run

        public void run(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Loops through all threads and checks for available thread, if not found, it will wait for an opening in thread[0] to execute the runnable.
        Parameters:
        runnable - The action for the thread to perform.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - The first thread is unable to join.

      • run

        public void run(java.lang.Thread newThread)
         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Loops through all threads and checks for available thread, if not found, it will wait for an opening in thread[0] to execute the runnable.
        Parameters:
        newThread - The thread to insert and start.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - The first thread is unable to join.

      • join

          throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Joins the indexed thread.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the thread to join.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - The indexed thread is unable to be joined.

      • joinAll

        public void joinAll()
             throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Joins all stored threads.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - A thread is unable to be joined.
